孈字的基本解释

孈
xié
古代中国北方神名：“遇神孈兮宴娭。”

孈
huī
愚憨多态。
美好的样子。

孈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
神名。

孈字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　孈； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页274第12
【唐韻】移尒切【集韻】演尒切，?音酏。【說文】愚贛多態。　又北方神名。【王逸·九思】回朅兮北逝，遇神孈兮宴娭。　又【廣韻】以水切【集韻】愈水切，?音唯。又胡卦切，音畫。又呼恚切，音毀。義?同。一曰過也。　又【集韻】山垂切，音䪎。又翾規切，音睢。又尹捶切，音䔺。又羽委切，音蔿。義?同。

孈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
孈字的起名意思

古代中国北方神名；美好的样子。

孈
Basic explanation of words
孈
xié
Ancient name of the gods in northern China: "Meeting the gods and feasting them."
孈
huī
Stupid and polymorphic.
Beautiful look.
Over.

God's name.
孈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　孈; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 274 to 12
[Tang Yun] Move and cut [Ji Yun] Play and cut, sound elixirs. [Said the text] Foolish Gan polymorphism.　The name of the northern god. 【Wang Yi·Nine Thoughts】Go back to the north and pass away, meet the gods and feast.　[Guangyun] Cut with water [Jiyun] Cut with water,? Sound only. Also cut the hexagram, sound and picture. He called Yunqie again, and the sound was ruined. Righteous? Same. One said too soon.　[Jiyun] The mountain is cut down and the sound is sing. Yi ruled and cut again, and the sound was Sui. Yin beat and cut again, and sounded. You Yu Weiqi, Yin Lin. Righteous? Same.
